S.FORM: Reuven Rivlin kakilimaan misiwkay tu tademaw nu ihekalay a kanatal nilacul nalecuhan ciniza i 9 a bulad 9 a demiad 1939 a mihcaan, Reuven Rivlin, u misingkiway a tademaw. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Israel ayza sa ci Reuven Rivlin, micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihcaan 7 a bulad 24 a demiad. u Iserael a kanatal sa, saicelangay a kanatal kuyni. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
